name: Chart
description:
Chart is a plugin for Figma that uses real or random data to create the most popular charts. Chart supports copy-paste from editors like Excel, Numbers, Google Sheets, live connection with Google Sheets and remote JSON (REST API), local CSV and JSON files.


Key features:

— 16 types of charts out-of-the-box

— creating multiple chart instances

— generate random data with different trends

— import data from CSV, JSON, Google Sheets, REST APIs, type to table input or just paste from table processors like Excel

— customize charts with different options

— update charts


About Chart:

https://chartplugin.com/
